bill.title: Employment Security
bill.description: Provides for payment of interest due on Title XII loans from the Employment and Training Fund. Authorizes the Director of Labor and Industrial Relations to increase the Employment and Training Fund assessment in increments of .01 per cent retroactive to January 1, 2011. (HB1077 HD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to LAB/ERB, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB/ERB on Friday, 02-04-11 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Yamashita, Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Saiki, Souki, Takumi, Fontaine; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Johanson; Noes: none; and Excused: none.

(H) The committees on ERB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Choy, Awana, Brower, Evans, Hashem, Nishimoto, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto, Pine; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
(H) Reported from LAB/ERB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 149) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Ito excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-10-11 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Coffman.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 237) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Monday, 02-14-11.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Pine voting no (1) and Representative(s) Thielen excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL/WAM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-18-11 9:00AM in conference room 016.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 9).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL/WAM.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Ihara.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 9 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Ryan, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 4 Excused: Senator(s) Kidani, Kim, Kouchi, Wakai.
(S) Reported from JDL/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 444) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 02-22-11.
(S) Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 18; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 6 (Senator(s) English, Espero, Gabbard, Galuteria, Taniguchi, Tsutsui). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 30).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
